alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bristol and southeastern Providence Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scituate, or near Johnston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, North Attleborough, Bridgewater, Attleboro, Mansfield, Easton, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Foxborough, Seekonk and Raynham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and southeastern Massachusetts...and Rhode Island.
